description.zh-cn: 唐朝、武周时期的著名宰相。
description.en: A famous chancellor of the Tang and Wu Zhou dynasties.

description.zh-cn: 武周皇帝，中国历史上唯一的女皇帝。
description.en: Empress of the Wu Zhou dynasty, the only female emperor in Chinese history.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝第三位皇帝。
description.en: The third emperor of the Tang dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝第四位和第六位皇帝。
description.en: The fourth and sixth emperor of the Tang dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝第五位和第九位皇帝。
description.en: The fifth and ninth emperor of the Tang dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝皇子，即后来的唐中宗。
description.en: A prince of the Tang dynasty, later Emperor Zhongzong.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝、武周时期宰相。
description.en: A chancellor of the Tang and Wu Zhou dynasties.

description.zh-cn: 武则天之侄。
description.en: Nephew of Wu Zetian.

description.zh-cn: 武周时期酷吏。
description.en: A secret police official of the Wu Zhou dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝、武周时期宰相。
description.en: A chancellor of the Tang and Wu Zhou dynasties.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝、武周时期宰相。
description.en: A chancellor of the Tang and Wu Zhou dynasties.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝官员、画家。
description.en: An official and painter of the Tang dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 狄仁杰之父。
description.en: Father of Di Renjie.

description.zh-cn: 狄仁杰之子。
description.en: Son of Di Renjie.

description.zh-cn: 狄仁杰的出生地。
description.en: Birthplace of Di Renjie.

description.zh-cn: 唐玄宗统治前期所出现的盛世。
description.en: The golden age during the early reign of Emperor Xuanzong of Tang.

description.zh-cn: 中国朝代。
description.en: A Chinese dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 武则天建立的朝代。
description.en: A dynasty established by Wu Zetian.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代官职，三公之一。
description.en: An ancient Chinese official title, one of the Three Ducal Ministers.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代爵位。
description.en: An ancient Chinese noble title.

description.zh-cn: 狄知逊是狄仁杰的父亲。
description.en: Di Zhixun was Di Renjie's father.

description.zh-cn: 狄光嗣是狄仁杰的儿子。
description.en: Di Guangsi was Di Renjie's son.

description.zh-cn: 狄仁杰出生于并州阳曲县。
description.en: Di Renjie was born in Yangqu County, Bingzhou.

description.zh-cn: 狄仁杰在唐高宗时期担任官员。
description.en: Di Renjie served as an official during the reign of Emperor Gaozong of Tang.

description.zh-cn: 狄仁杰在武则天时期担任宰相。
description.en: Di Renjie served as chancellor during the reign of Wu Zetian.

description.zh-cn: 阎立本发现狄仁杰的才能并推荐了他。
description.en: Yan Liben discovered Di Renjie's talent and recommended him.

description.zh-cn: 武承嗣勾结来俊臣诬陷狄仁杰谋反，使其下狱。
description.en: Wu Chengsi colluded with Lai Junchen to falsely accuse Di Renjie of rebellion, leading to his imprisonment.

description.zh-cn: 来俊臣诬陷狄仁杰谋反，将其逮捕下狱。
description.en: Lai Junchen framed Di Renjie for rebellion and had him arrested and imprisoned.

description.zh-cn: 劝说武则天顺应民心，还政于庐陵王李显，使李唐得以维系。
description.en: Persuaded Wu Zetian to follow the will of the people and restore power to Li Xian, Prince of Luling, thus preserving the Tang lineage.

description.zh-cn: 娄师德在狄仁杰未入相时曾经举荐他。
description.en: Lou Shide recommended Di Renjie before he became chancellor.

description.zh-cn: 狄仁杰在当上宰相后，因不知娄师德曾举荐自己而排挤他。
description.en: After becoming chancellor, unaware that Lou Shide had recommended him, Di Renjie sidelined him.

description.zh-cn: 狄仁杰在武则天时代的贡献为后来的开元盛世奠定了基础。
description.en: Di Renjie's contributions during the Wu Zetian era laid the foundation for the subsequent Kaiyuan Flourishing Age.

description.zh-cn: 举荐了张柬之等数十位干练的官员。
description.en: Recommended dozens of capable officials, including Zhang Jianzhi.

description.zh-cn: 举荐了姚崇等数十位干练的官员。
description.en: Recommended dozens of capable officials, including Yao Chong.

description.zh-cn: 继位后追赠狄仁杰为司空。
description.en: Posthumously honored Di Renjie with the title of Sikong after ascending the throne.

description.zh-cn: 追封狄仁杰为梁国公。
description.en: Posthumously ennobled Di Renjie as the Duke of Liang.

description.zh-cn: 上谏劝阻武则天停止建造耗资巨大的浮屠大像。
description.en: Advised Wu Zetian to stop the costly construction of a giant Buddha statue.
